api_list.name: Optimize
api_list.description: Get optimal tour plans for a given set of vehicles jobs and service orders
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fleet-tour-planning1.p.rapidapi.com/optimize"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fleet-tour-planning1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
